```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

unique <- readRDS("~/YKim-Linguistics/ykim_korean-analysis/unique_database.rds")
```

```{r}
unique_check <- unique |>
  mutate(
    n_jamo = str_count(Jamo_Cleaned_Unicode, "\\S+") ,  
    n_ipa  = str_count(IPA_Syllable_Unicode, "\\S+")
  ) |>
  mutate(equal_length = n_jamo == n_ipa)

unique_check |>
  filter(equal_length == FALSE)
```
